title: Man shot-dead in Theldeniya; Four men carried out the murder
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Police said that a 38-year-old person was shot dead in Rangala, Theldeniya.
According to the Police, a group of four men had carried out the shooting at 1.00 AM, while the victim resting in his residence.
Sri Lanka Police said the deceased had returned from Colombo two monnths ago, and was living on rent.
Police further said that the suspects had fled the area, and investigations are underway to arrest them.
Ranjith Siyambalapitiya to continue as Deputy Speaker subject to conditions
